room_title: Escape room "Behind Bars" by Locked Inside Room Escape in Melbourne
review: My group of friends and I had a blast in their Behind Bars escape room! The room was challenging, but not impossible if you all work together to figure out the clues. We all had a great time, and escaped with 11 minutes to spare! Our team will definitely come back to try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Behind Bars" by Locked Inside Room Escape in Melbourne
review: That was a ton of fun. We escaped the prison cells!

room_title: Escape room "Behind Bars" by Locked Inside Room Escape in Melbourne
review: We did the jail break room. It was fantastic!!! The clues were well thought out and the room design was amazing! It truly promotes teamwork! Never had so much fun NOT getting out!! The staff were the friendliest people! And they love what they do! They were our cheerleaders!! Can't wait to come and try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Behind Bars" by Locked Inside Room Escape in Melbourne
review: We had a great time in the Behind Bars room today. For our first time, we were worried we were going to feel really stupid and just run out of time but everything is pretty straight forward and great for people on all levels of the puzzle solving scale!
